transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good and very convenient. The room is quite decent but very clean. The hygiene of chain hotels is very reassuring! The service attitude at the front desk is very good. I will go there again next time I have the opportunity.

Thank you very much for your stay and sharing, and also thank you for your high recognition of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The smile on your lips is our greatest appreciation. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay. Environment, all the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
